website_summaries.verdict: These flexible plastic hoops work both indoors and outdoors, and are forgiving when they take hits.
pros: Made of flexible plastic, so you won't damage your drone

customer_reviews.title: Even more fun with LEDs
customer_reviews.text: All the parts are modular and easy to snap together. I thew in an Arduino and LED strip to make it even more exciting!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A. Graupmann

customer_reviews.title: These constantly break
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this product! These constantly break. Great idea but bad execution. Ordered multiple packages. Some even came broken, I reached out to company but after they replaced some I do not think they were interested in replacing anymore. This is part of their ad; 12 MONTH WARRANTY - we look after our customers. Any issues, just message us and we will take care of it. Simple as that. All you need is a good drone for kids and you are ready to race! They didn't stand behind that statement for me....Not worth the headache I promise. We wanted them to be cool, but they just wern't.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Durable, lightweight and easy to see.
customer_reviews.text: Durable, yet not so hard to break your drone. Does need anchor/ held down in wind / from wind of drone occasionally, easy to do. Assembly can be challenging due to tight tolerances, a little experimentation will help find a good method. Easy to hang or mount sideways. Perfect for small, (Parrot Mambo size) and mini drones. The extra pieces are a great bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Stephe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble less than a minute
customer_reviews.text: Love the hoops, its made my drone flying a lot more fun. I was concerned that they may be hard to put together after reading one of the reviews but it was really easy actually, took me less than a minute to have them setup. They also aren't affected by blade strike which is a nice little surprise. I've hit them at high speed and nothing broke. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jimmyjimmyhere

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to Assemble! Love the extra 6 pieces, I was able to make 2 hanging hoops and 2 ground hoops
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Grupe

customer_reviews.title: difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: For the price this should be a good system. However, I found the slots to be too narrow to easily assemble; my guess is that is done on purpose so that the pieces fit snugly together and don't come apart? Unfortunately, if you don't "file" the slot down just a little bit you'll be forced to use excess pressure to push together the pieces this will cause the tip to crack off.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: For the man who has everything!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased as gift for a man who has everything and loves drones! Truly the most difficult person to by a gift for! He went crazy over this, and uses in the home with mini drones and outdoors with larger ones! He has drone racing party’s outdoors, works well while social distancing In the wide open spaces! Rare find!
customer_reviews.author: D.D

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but pegs are too hard and soft for little hands
customer_reviews.text: These are a fun way to make indoor drone racing more challenging. However, the plastic is a little too brittle making it hard for little hands to connect and breaks easily if twisted. Once built the hoops are sturdy enough, but expensive for what you get. We used the legs to make an extra hoop and mounted on the ceiling using Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: DevM

customer_reviews.title: hard to put together very flemsy
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. Your drone wont get damanaged but the parts are hard to get in and its not worth the time and effort to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson Perez

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble and parts will break
customer_reviews.text: Hard to assemble and the plastic brakes while installing carefully! Is the tabs to hook in, they to wide in some parts and it doesn’t fit tru the channel to lock it! What about if I have to take it apart? It will break definitely!
customer_reviews.author: Hector O Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Works but VERY cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Guess I can't be too harsh because these are pretty cheap. Almost cut my hands putting them together though. Plastic is really rough and cheap and they are HARD to put together. Wear gloves if you can.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G.

customer_reviews.title: Breaks into pieces when building.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a licensed drone operator and very familiar with all sizes, types and budgets. These hoops looked easy and great, HOWEVER, they are NOT easy and don’t just click in place. They were literally crumbling in my hands as I was attempting to click them with minimal pressure. Ordered several boxes & ended up returning all. Not worth the headache. Might as well just mount it hang some hula hoops. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should get 2 boxes to make it more difficult
customer_reviews.text: Husband was getting bored with his drones this made it a little more challenging to fly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Very cool accessory for a drone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this obstacle course as part of a gift to go along with a drone I was giving. It is an awesome addition to the drone and brings a whole new dimension for ways to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Very fragile.
customer_reviews.text: This is hot garbage. They broke the first time it fell over. Then it really broke trying to take apart and put back in the box. I threw that garbage away.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great for teaching movement
customer_reviews.text: The hoops force the students to learn to move RC drones and helicopters around the classroom as they learn to fly.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Broke while putting it together
customer_reviews.text: No way to take apart without breaking more. Cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Pecnik

customer_reviews.title: Cheap made and not easy
customer_reviews.text: These are cheaply made and not easy to put together. and even harder to take apart to store.
customer_reviews.author: G Golden

customer_reviews.title: You'll need boxes or pillars if you want them at eye level or close to it.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble. Durable material. Got the job done for our program.
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: having a lot of fun with this
customer_reviews.text: I practiced want this a lot helped me with my drone
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: So hard to put together. The pieces beak (when trying to put together). I was only able to make one hoop fully. I either couldn’t get the pieces together or they broke 😕
customer_reviews.author: Wendy K. Plehn

customer_reviews.title: GOOD TRAINING TOOL
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A GREAT TRAINING PRODUCT. I RECOMMEND IT HIGHLY.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W. McGinley

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get apart and much larger than the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Devin F.

customer_reviews.title: Read carefully
customer_reviews.text: This is only one. Very pricey for what you get. I wouldn't have bought it had I read more carefully.
customer_reviews.author: K. Masson

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight
customer_reviews.text: This product is great the hoops are big so easy to fly through. It is a bit difficult to snap the pieces into place. I broke a couple but luckily they give you several extras incase this happens. When assembling I would recommend using plyers to snap them into place.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Medina

customer_reviews.title: Cooool
customer_reviews.text: What a challenge! I recently got into drones with my 2 boys, initially only one of the boys could fly it through the eagle pro hoops but now we are all able to get through them. Its seriously improved our flying skills! Easy enough to assemble, really cool addon item for drone fliers.
customer_reviews.author: Torben Lauritsen

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The size of the octagonal-shaped obstacle towers is a perfect size, not too large or small. I used the Eagle pro setup in a school with a TELLO mini drone with dji technology. It worked well for our activity. It can even be shared with math and physics teachers, teaching angles, geometry, velocity, etc. as the pieces can be re-shaped into other shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Harris

customer_reviews.title: Made for tiny drones
customer_reviews.text: This is ONLY for tiny drones not the standard sized one my friend has.
customer_reviews.author: LaurieAnn176

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice add on to your learning curve.
customer_reviews.author: Popoff

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Difficult to assemble then it just falls over with the slightest breeze.
customer_reviews.author: KD5WCJ

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: My son received this for Christmas and there were a few extra pieces... luckily. Two of the pieces broke during assembly. Other than that he really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Crandall

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with these -- I would not recommend this product! They constantly break.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Beyenhof

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic that is hard to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic that is hard to put together. I broke two pieces before I even had it fully assembled 😖
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: PIA to assemble. Forget trying to disassemble to store, they broke when trying.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: Very very hard to assemble and impossible to dissemble
customer_reviews.text: This is a useless product. Very very hard to assemble and impossible to dissemble. Don’t bother. Hope I can return.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Rider

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my grandson when I got him a small drone. He loves them. He zooms thru and gets his drone to do loops over to the next hoop. This is all outside, although he would love to use them in the house!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avengers Adventure Drone Obstacle Course
customer_reviews.text: We used this product for a drone racing class as part of our Avengers Adventure summer camp. Students learned about drone technology and how to fly through a course!
customer_reviews.author: Janeen Mancino

customer_reviews.title: The thrill of the chase
customer_reviews.text: Compact and easy to use. Test your skills and flying ability with this unique course.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Van Dam

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Totally fun and easy to put together. It has helped a lot with my flying skills.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Souza

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap gates
customer_reviews.text: These race gates are nice. They're cheap, durable, and light. If you smack them with your drone they just tip over. Nothing breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for education
customer_reviews.text: These are spectacular for the drones I use in my classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Starkey

product_meta.title: Drone Racing Obstacle Course. Easy to Build Racing Drone Kit. Create Your Own Drone Racing League. Suitable Drone Games for Kid or Adults (Amazon Exclusive)
feature_bullets: YOUR VERY OWN DRONE RACING KIT - set it up at home, the office or outside. Fly solo or multi player racing. Choose a fast drone race course or a technical course. Unleash your inner drone racer
EASY TO BUILD - takes just a few minutes to build the racing drone kit. No extra parts required, they snap into place easily. Now you have your very own drone racing league just like drl racing

PORTABLE - dismantle your drone obstacle course and take them to the park for drone games or a friend's house for a drone competition. Slide your drone racing parts straight back into the original box.

PROTECT YOUR DRONE - This race drone kit is made from flexible plastic to protect your drone when you hit the hoops. It's much cheaper to replace an arm on the hoop than repair a broken drone. We include 2 spare arms per hoop.
12 MONTH WARRANTY - we look after our customers. Any issues, just message us and we will take care of it. Simple as that. All you need is a good drone for kids and you are ready to race!
